com.yantra.ycp.japi.util

Interface YCPEncrypter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.sterlingcommerce.woodstock.util.frame.SCIPropertyEncrypter, com.yantra.yfc.util.YFCEncrypter

    public interface YCPEncrypter
extends com.yantra.yfc.util.YFCEncrypter
    Encryption Interface. Implement this interface to provide a custom encryption/decryption logic. The implemented class needs to be setup in the yfs.properties file. The implementation class should be specified through the property yfs.encrypter.class. The methods implemented will be called for/from the following components:-
    Encrypting the credit card number.
    getDecryptedString API.
    getEncryptedString API.
    getDecryptedCreditCardNumber API.
    getEncryptedCreditCardNumber API.

      Decrypt a encrypted string.

        java.lang.String decrypt(java.lang.String sData)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Decrypt a encrypted string. This method should take a encrypted string and return a decrypted string. sData Encrypted String passed as input to the method. Exception Exception encountered while decrypting the encrypted string. Decrypted string.
